# Navigate by *incipit*/*explicit* of Biblical books



## Overview

View table of contents of all six volumes as a tabular summary or numbered list of items. Each entry lists the page reference where each Biblical book begins and ends. Page references are linked to page images.


## Notebook

- [HTML version](./toc-codex.html) (readable in a web browser)
- [Pluto notebook](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts/refs/heads/main/pluto/physical-artifact/toc-codex.jl) (download and open in Pluto)
